mapper.sql: begindt, batch, siptemp, siptime, username, countnum
mapper.delete: delete from excel2baseinfo where begindt BETWEEN #{beginDT,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endDT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into excel2baseinfo(begindt, batch, siptemp, siptime, username, countnum) values (#{begindt,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siptemp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countnum,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into excel2baseinfo
id,
begindt,
batch,
siptemp,
siptime,
username,
countnum,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{begindt,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{siptemp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{siptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{countnum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update:
update excel2baseinfo
begindt = #{begindt,jdbcType=CHAR},
batch = #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
siptemp = #{siptemp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
siptime = #{siptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
countnum = #{countnum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update excel2baseinfo set begindt = #{begindt,jdbcType=CHAR}, batch = #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, siptemp = #{siptemp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, siptime = #{siptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, countnum = #{countnum,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
